user.title: Zaprite Account
user.text: Manage your Zaprite account login details.

email.text: Add your new email above. Once you click Update, you will be asked to confirm your password. Finally, you will need to verify your new email before being able to login again.

modal.title: Change Account Email
modal.message: <0>Your Zaprite account email will be changed to <1>{{email}}</1></0>

toast.success: Your account email has been changed!
toast.incorrect: Your password is incorrect. Please try again.
toast.error: Something went wrong. Your account email was not updated.

toast.incorrect: Your current password is incorrect. Please try again.

company.page_text: This is your default company information that appears on new Invoices.

toast.success: Your company profile has been successfully updated!
toast.error: Something went wrong. Your company profile was not updated.

payments.page_text: Integrate various payment methods for your Invoices.

activated.title: Activated Payment Methods
activated.text: Your activated payment methods are shown below.
activated.desc: If a payment method below is activated but disabled, it won't be available on any new Invoices. If enabled globally here, you can toggle availability on individual Invoices. You can also set it as a default on new Invoices.
activated.none: No payment methods have been activated.

edit.make_default: Enable this payment method on new Invoices?

toast.success: Your payment info was successfully updated!
toast.error: Something went wrong. The payment method was not updated.

wallets.xpub_message: Required: Your xPub will be used to generate a new receiving address for each invoice payment.

bitcoin.text: Bitcoin payments are currently supported by manually adding a receiving address to individual invoices. We will be adding xPub integration shortly in order to automate this process.

liquid.text: Liquid Network payments are currently supported by manually adding a receiving address to individual Invoices. We will be adding xPub integration shortly in order to automate this process.

interac.text: <0>Add your <1>Interac<2></2> e-Transfer</1> information to offer email payments on your Invoices.</0>

auto-deposit.label: Auto Deposit?
auto-deposit.text: Do you have auto-deposit setup for this email?

interac.desc: Required: These details will be shown to the recipient when they are paying the Invoice.

sepa.text: <0>Add your IBAN account information for Euro <1></1> payments.</0>
sepa.desc: Required: These details will be shown to the recipient when they are paying the Invoice.

available.subtitle: Available payment methods
available.text: Add additional payment methods to your account.

toast.error: Something went wrong. The payment method was not added.

billing.page_text: This is your current Zaprite subscription information.

verified.page_text: Your email address has been verified and you can now start using your Zaprite account.
